tool_description: An API showing the current temperature and forecasted temperatures in nearly any location around the world.
name: Weather Live
title: Weather Live

api_list.name: Get a forecast of temperatures for the next 14 days for a particular location.
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the forecasted temperatures for the next 14 days in nearly any location around the world. (Index 0 is tomorrow, index 13 is 14 days from now).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com/weather/forecast/el-dorado-hills"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com/weather/forecast/{weatherid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get current temperature for a particular location.
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the current temperature from nearly any location around the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com/weather/today/el-dorado-hills"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com/weather/today/{weatherid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
